wikipedia_page.main: Simon David Heathfield (born 1967) is a British Anglican priest. Since November 2014, he has been the Archdeacon of Aston in the Church of England.

response: The post was created from the Archdeaconry of Birmingham by Order-in-Council on 23 October 1906 and is currently held by Simon Heathfield.
* 16 November 2014–present: Simon HeathfieldDiocese of Birmingham – Notification of Appointments, 8 September 2014  (Accessed 13 September 2014)
